channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Narwal adds AI to its vacuum cleaners to monitor pets and find jewelry
item.description: Narwal's new robo vacuum cleaner switches to quiet mode near a baby's crib.

item.title: AMD unveils new AI PC processors for general use and gaming at CES
item.description: AMD announced the latest version of its AI-powered PC chips designed for a variety of tasks from gaming to content creation and multitasking.

item.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
item.description: A hacker known as Martha Root broke in and deleted three white supremacist websites at the end of a talk during the annual hacker conference Chaos Com...

item.title: Microsoft’s Nadella wants us to stop thinking of AI as ‘slop’
item.description: Nadella wants us to think of AI as a human helper instead of a slop-generating job killer. New data for 2026 indicates he could be right.

item.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
item.description: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make ...

item.title: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry
item.description: Insight Partners sued by former vice president Kate Lowry.

item.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
item.description: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order, which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.

item.title: This is Uber’s new robotaxi from Lucid and Nuro
item.description: The production-intent version, unveiled at CES 2026 on Monday, will be an exceptionally roomy entry into the growing robotaxi market later this year.

item.title: These On-Ear Beats Headphones Are Marked Down by $70
item.description: What these headphones lack in active noise canceling, they make up for with big, bold sound.

item.title: Lego’s Smart Brick Gives the Iconic Analog Toy a New Digital Brain
item.description: The new sensor-packed Smart Play Brick will land this spring as part of a special Star Wars collection. The update adds interactive lights and sound t...
